Jeremiah or Jeremias__36.5__Shut up: : Not that the prophet was now in prison; for the contrary appears from ver. 19, but that he kept himself shut up, by reason of the persecutions he had lately met with. See chap. 26.
Jeremiah or Jeremias__36.30__He shall have none: : Because his son Joachin or Jechonias, within three months after the death of his father, was carried away to Babylon, so that his reign is not worthy of notice.
